question: Tell me about NIET.
answer:
Noida Institute of Engineering & Technology (NIET), Greater Noida, is one of the premier Engineering and Management institutes of India’s National Capital Region (NCR).

Noida Institute of Engineering & Technology (NIET), a self-financed institute, offering high-standard quality education to students from all corners of the country, is situated in Greater Noida (a hub of global MNCs). The institute has a sprawling area of 23 acres with a lush green ambience all around.

Noida Institute of Engineering & Technology (NIET) has established itself as a centre of excellence and a leader in the academic arena nationally. It is the first-ever private educational institution in Uttar Pradesh to have received Autonomous status by the University Grants Commission (UGC), a government body responsible for the coordination, determination, and maintenance of educational standards in the country.

The institute is accredited by NAAC (A Grade, 3.23) and NBA (CSE, ECE, ME, Biotechnology, B.Pharm, MBA, MCA, and PGDM), and ranked by NIRF (37th in NIET Pharmacy Institute; 101–150 rank band in NIET Greater Noida Engineering Institute). The institute aims at recognizing, respecting, and nurturing the creative potential of each student.

question: What is the procedure for direct admission to NIET?
answer: • Candidate must fill online application form on NIET institute website. Documents need to be verified. Course and Branch will be allocated to candidate according to their merit/test/seat availability. College fee payment for allocated course and branch.

question: The college admission  process?
answer: Admission Process:- Allotment on the basis of JEE mains/UPCET Counselling conductted by AKTU, Lucknow (85% of total seat) and Direct Admission (15 % of Total Seat). For Registration:-  https://applynow.niet.co.in/

question: What are the Initial documents required for admission?
answer: • Candidate applying for admission should carry the original and two sets of photocopies of all his/her testimonials. The documents required are: Aadhar Card 10 th Marksheet and certificate 12 th Marksheet and certificate Graduation degree and mark sheets (in case of PG courses and lateral entry) Proof of Entrance Exam 5 passport size photographs Proof of gap years (if any)

question: How one can deposit college fee?
answer: • Candidate can go to NIET website and select the online fee payment option. Demand Draft should be in favour of Noida Institute of Engineering & Technology, Greater Noida, payable at New Delhi

question: What is the average package offered in NIET?
answer: • The average package offered in NIET placement record 2024 is 6.02 LPA.

question: I have done 10+2 from NIOS, Am I eligible?
answer: • Yes, as per AKTU Norms NIOS Candidate is eligible for B. Tech. admission.

question: Is the transport facility (college bus) available?
answer: • Yes (Available from Noida /Delhi NCR/Bulandshahr)

question: Is there any provision for scholarship?
answer: • Scholarship provided by the different agencies like UP – State Government, AICTE, NSP, PMS-Online, e-Kalyan, Post Matric Bihar and other departmental scholarships. Bihar Student Credit Card (BSCC) may be also availed by the eligible students of Bihar.

question: How can the institute support, if the candidate wants to apply for an education loan?
answer: • Once the candidate has paid the amount to reserve the seat, the Provisional Admission Certificate is issued by the institution. Bona fide, Demand note, Placement details, and any other document required by the bank will be provided to the candidate by the institution enabling them to process for the education loan.

question: What are the timings for admissions?
answer: • NIET remains open for admissions between 9:00 a.m. to 5:00 p.m. (IST), Monday to Saturday, except on major Indian holidays.

question: Is there a campus Tour for visitors?
answer: • Yes, candidate is taken for a campus visit which includes visit to respective departments, Innovation labs, Library and Hostel and other facilities.

question: Is the college Autonomous? What are the advantages?
answer: • Yes, the college is Autonomous and can design its own course curriculum according to the needs of the industry. With this, students are educated about the latest technologies so that they can be prepared according to the needs of the industry to provide them better employment opportunities globally. Soft skills and industrial training are part of the curriculum and we have industry experts on board to take lectures and spread awareness to students through different medium on the latest technologies in industries. One can get honours degree using MOOCs platform like Coursera, Infosys springboard etc.

question: What is the medium of instruction in the class?
answer: • English is the medium of instruction in the class

question: Do you have any agents/consultant through whom we can apply?
answer: • We do not have any agents through whom you can apply. Students/ Parents should contact the Institute Helpline No. 8010500700 and connect with the Institute’s Admission cell directly for any information/admission.

question: How does the college admission process work?
answer: • UPCET Counselling - The candidate needs to appear for the JEE Exam and appear in online counselling of UPCET. Candidate needs to opt NIET as the preferred choice in any of the branches we offer. Direct Admission - The college may conduct admission tests / on a merit basis / other criteria defined by the college admission policy. In case you meet the eligibility criteria as per AKTU norms, then the application is further processed for document verification. Upon successful verification, you will be offered provisional admission.

question: What about Drinking Water Facilities in hostel?
answer: • RO water supply and water coolers are available in hostels to provide safe drinking water to students.

question: What about Non veg in hostel?
answer: • No, non-veg food is not available in NIET hostels.

question: What about Breakfast / Dinner / Lunch in hostel?
answer: • Breakfast, lunch, and dinner are available in NIET hostels every day. More information is available on the website.

question: What about Tea / Coffee in hostel?
answer: • Tea or coffee is available during breakfast in the hostel mess.

question: What about Washing Machine in hostel?
answer: • Washing machine facilities are provided by the hostel for washing clothes.

question: What about Iron in hostel?
answer: • Iron is not provided by the hostel.

question: What about Hostel Furniture in hostel?
answer: • Hostel rooms are equipped with essential furniture including a bed, almirah, study table, chair, and book shelf for students.

question: What about Hostel WiFi in hostel?
answer: • WiFi connectivity is available in the hostel premises for academic and educational purposes.

question: What about Geyser in hostel?
answer: • Geyser facilities are provided in hostels to ensure availability of hot water for students.

question: What are NIET’s research areas, research focus, and academic rankings?
answer:
• The institute actively promotes research culture through faculty and student participation in funded projects, publications, patents, and industry collaborations.

• NIET’s areas of research include Artificial Intelligence & Machine Learning, Augmented and Virtual Reality, Human–Machine Interaction, Industry 5.0 (Industrial IoT), Robotics & Automation, Autonomous Guided Navigation, Biotechnology, Computer Vision & Image Processing, Smart Cities Infrastructure, Cloud & Edge Computing, 5G Wireless Communication, VLSI Technology, Novel Drug Delivery Systems, Computer Aided Drug Design, Microbiological Studies, and Anticancer Research.

• NIET has a strong patent portfolio with 119 design patents published and granted, along with 10 standard patents published and 5 standard patents granted.

• NIET has undertaken multiple funded research projects across Biotechnology, Management, and ECE departments, led by faculty members and supported by grants from DST, DBT, CST-UP, AKTU (TEQIP-III), EAI, and DSIR, covering areas such as biotechnology innovation, sustainable management practices, and applications of AI in 5G and IoT between 2019 and 2024.

  https://niet.co.in/research/overview

question: What are NIET rankings?
answer:
• NIET has been featured in the National Institutional Ranking Framework (NIRF) in the Engineering category in recent years.
• The institute has received national recognition through accreditation and ranking frameworks.

question: What awards has NIET received?
answer:
• Several programs at NIET are accredited by the National Board of Accreditation (NBA).
• NIET has received awards for academic excellence and industry–institute collaboration.
• The institute is accredited by NAAC with Grade A.

question: Research area at NIET?
answer:
• Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning
• Data Science and Analytics
• Internet of Things (IoT)
• Robotics and Automation
• VLSI Design and Embedded Systems
• Wireless Communication
• Biotechnology
• Cyber Security

question: Explain NIET research focus.
answer:
• NIET promotes research activities among faculty members and students across engineering, technology, and management disciplines.
• The institute encourages innovation, publications, patents, and participation in funded research projects.

question: What facilities does NIET have?
answer:
• Smart classrooms with modern teaching aids.
• Well-equipped engineering and computing laboratories.
• Central library with books, journals, and digital resources.
• Separate hostels for boys and girls with security and amenities.
• Indoor and outdoor sports facilities.
• Medical room with first-aid facilities.
• Auditorium and seminar halls for events.
• Cafeteria providing hygienic food options.
• Transportation facility for students and staff.

question: Is there any Housing/hostel accommodation facility?
answer: • NIET provides in-campus comfortable and well hygienic hostel accommodation separately for boys and girls with all standard civic amenities. Hostel accommodation is mandatory for all the non-residents of Delhi/NCR.
